title: Pixel 3 doesn't recognize headphones
content:
In the last couple of days, my Pixel 3 doesn't recognize the headphones. When I plug it, I get a notification saying 'charging connected device via USB'.
Happens for both the google headphones that came with the device and older headphones connected through the adapter.
Chraging works fine, so it's not a buggy slot.
I tried safe mode and resetting the device, but it didn't help.
I've also tried switching to USB debugging mode.
